CS:S. nic dodać nic ująć. Spray-e jak w CoDzie XD. Mało rusków bo onie wolą CS GO, a mi dobrze z Source. Bhop(loff), serweryFFA(loff), społeczność na serwerach(loff), nie ma dzieci bez mutacji które wyzywają ci matke i, że ją ruchali i tak dalej i tak pewnie koleznaki nawet za cycka niegdy nie złapali >:3.
Koncząc to powiem jedno: Najlepsza inwestycja w moim życiu( przynajmniej jedna z najlepszych)

After 12 years since it's initial release, this game is still one of the best from the Counter Strike franchise. And even after 12 years, there are still dozens upon dozens of servers filled with people. I grew up playing the pirated copy of this with a bunch of friends on a LAN server. Oh yeah and the deagle is pretty op in this.

IT´s a nice game

Valve has taken a large selection of the maps from Counter-Strike 1.6 - Office, Havana, Italy, Aztec, Chateau, Cobble, Piranesi and of course eternal favourites Dust and Dust 2, and recreated them for the source engine. This means all new textures and major aesthetic changes with more complex buildings and scenery. In addition, the levels are scattered with objects that react realistically with the Source engine's physics engine. [GamersEurope.com] The game is available through Valve's Steam downloading service and is distributed with "Half-Life 2."
